description:
Using traditional astrology for predictions and some fortune telling has been the most common way of determining a person's life mission. This course aims to introduce a new understanding of what our true-life mission is through karmic numerology.

As we have always known numbers since childhood, it is easier working with numbers than dealing with astrological symbols. What's more, Pythagoras a mathematician in the 6th century BC said, “Nothing could exit in the Universe without the numbers.

As we are part of this Universe we are therefore part of the numbers and represent a “fragment of the power and divine knowledge". Karmic Numerology, created by Myrtha Feller Mueller, makes learning how to determine your own destiny easy by using numbers and letters as symbols as well as other techniques in order to build a karmic numerological chart.

This course contains over 10 lectures. It is designed for anyone, who wishes to know how to determine their own destiny. Beginning with traditional numerology will help you, the student, to learn the meanings of numbers, the composition of numbers as symbols, and the explanation of how to use them. Furthermore, your personal numbers will help you to understand who you truly are. You'll learn how to calculate the numbers in your name in order to understand how your name represents your personality, your motivation, and your inherited karma. The “Karmic Bag" Exercise shows the choices of karmas that need to be worked on in this present life, and the Universal Path of Life. By adding the hour of your birth to universal path of life you find your Individual Path of life. And finally, you'll learn how to use your numbers to build a karmic numerological chart in order to find your true self and your life mission that you must reach.
title: Numbers and Karma
